name: Stellos
description:
Welcome to Stellos, a Sci-Fi Twine game, in the "Commonwealth of Revalon" setting. I am currently working on building this setting.

You play the same character from Revalon, earlier on in their career.

Much like Revalon, this is a choice-driven story, where your decisions affect the ending you get. Also, just like Revalon, the stats that you chose affect the decisions you can make. I intend to flesh out this setting further, in the form of games and stories.
